E

eatFruit(int, SpriteModel, ArrayList<SpriteModel>) - Method in class com.snake.LevelController
Adds a new sprite with the snake-body image to snakeBody direction of which is determined in SpriteModel, increasing the length of snake by 1.
endGameScore - Variable in class com.snake.GameModel
Player's score at end of game
endless - Variable in class com.snake.GameModel
True: The user has beaten the game and has pressed the button to take them to endless Level 3, False: they haven't
endlessButton - Variable in class com.snake.GameOverController
Button to launch endless mode
endlessMode() - Method in class com.snake.GameOverController
Loads the game back into Level Three for an endless run, passing the user's existing score to it via GameModel.
errorLabel - Variable in class com.snake.GameOverController
Shows messages to user relating to status of their score being saved
exitButton() - Method in class com.snake.StartScreenController
Closes application safely with exit code 0
